name: @vivocha/bot-sdk
description: Vivocha Bot SDK: TypeScript / JavaScript SDK to create/integrate chatbots with the Vivocha platform

scripts.clean: npx rimraf dist coverage .nyc_output uploads test-results
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npx rimraf node_modules
scripts.build:examples: (cd examples/lambda-bot-manager && rimraf node_modules && npm i && npm run build) && (cd examples/lambda-bot-filter && rimraf node_modules && npm i && npm run build) && (tsc -p examples)
scripts.build:all: npm i && npm run build && npm run build:tests && npm run build:examples
scripts.test:precommit: npm run clean:all && npm i && npm run build && npm run build:tests && npm run build:examples && npm run cover
scripts.test: find ./test/ts -type f -name '*.js' -delete && npm run build:tests && mocha --exit --no-timeouts --recursive --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=test-results test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:debug: npm run build && tsc -p test && mocha --inspect-brk --recursive test/**/*.test.js

author: Vivocha Development Team <dev@vivocha.com> (https://www.vivocha.com)

hooks.pre-commit: npm run build && npm run cover && npm run check-coverage
